channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very deep pothole and Shurdington Nurseries hedge, 8th July
item.description:
Very deep potholes along Dark Lane. Also vehicles to avoid Shurdington Nurseries hedge which they never cut are driving off the opposite side of the lanes tarmac creating a deep rut, which it is becoming difficult to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dark Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
No red light on left when turning left from Centrum Park onto Tewkesbury Rd

item.title: Bins 2 lots, 8th July
item.description:
Bins left out on pavements along the wall of number 15 St Pauls walk, constant problem of not placing bins away as described in council rules on refuse collection
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, St Paul's Walk, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Rubbish Bins and Recycling, 8th July
item.description:
Rubbish bins and recycling bins left on pavement and not being placed within boundary of property as summerised on council webpages, that all bins must be removed within 24hrs of collection day. This is an ongoing issue with bins spilling out onto local area. Bins also smell of rotting food.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Manser Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ragwort, 6th July
item.description:
There is a very large number of ragwort plants which are classed as a notable plant. It needs to be safely removed before it spreads.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury

item.title: Long grass restricting view of road, 6th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tommy Taylors Lane, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole as you drive in to Finstock close, 5th July
item.description:
Pothole roughly opposite number 3. Reported earlier in the year, had an email to say it was fixed. It never was. Forwarded that email to highways, still not fixed and now much bigger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Swanswell Drive, St Mark's, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: Traffic lights sequence is too quick for the speed limit of the road, 3rd July
item.description:
Driving on the legal speed limit towards barnwood, the traffic lights changed so quickly to red that heavy braking was required. There is absolutely no need to change so quickly, it is dangerous. Slow the sequence down.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
